description.p: Qpdf Tools is an easy-to-use Qt interface for Ghostscript and QPDF.
Qpdf Tools makes possible for normal users to manage their PDFs.
With Qpdf Tools, you can easily compress, split, merge and even rotate your pdf documents.
This Changelog will no longer be updated.
If you want information about updates, access the project's GitHub.
